description: Monkey D. Luffy es el capitán de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja y uno de los piratas más reconocidos de los mares. Posee la Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika, que le otorga habilidades elásticas y poderes únicos al despertar. Su sueño es encontrar el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
name: Monkey D. Luffy

transformations.name: Gear Second
transformations.description: Una técnica en la que Luffy aumenta su velocidad y poder al bombear sangre más rápido en su cuerpo.

transformations.name: Gear Third
transformations.description: Luffy infla partes de su cuerpo para aumentar su tamaño y fuerza, resultando en poderosos ataques.

transformations.name: Gear Fourth - Boundman
transformations.description: Luffy utiliza su Haki de Armamento para inflar partes de su cuerpo, obteniendo una forma robusta y poderosa con habilidades de rebote. Esta transformación aumenta su velocidad, fuerza y resistencia.

transformations.name: Gear Fourth - Tankman
transformations.description: Una versión de Gear Fourth donde Luffy infla aún más su cuerpo para incrementar su defensa y fuerza, ideal para absorber y devolver ataques.

transformations.name: Gear Fourth - Snakeman
transformations.description: Otra variación de Gear Fourth que prioriza la velocidad y flexibilidad, permitiéndole a Luffy atacar desde múltiples ángulos con golpes de alta velocidad.

transformations.name: Gear Fifth - Nika
transformations.description: La forma 'liberada' de Luffy tras el despertar de su Fruta del Diablo. En esta transformación, puede manipular su cuerpo y el entorno con habilidades altamente flexibles y cómicas, como la personificación del 'Dios del Sol' Nika.

name: Roronoa Zoro
description: Roronoa Zoro es el espadachín de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja y uno de los espadachines más fuertes del mundo. Su meta es convertirse en el mejor espadachín del mundo.

weapons.name: Wado Ichimonji
weapons.description: Una de las 21 espadas O Wazamono, conocida por su gran filo y durabilidad.

weapons.name: Enma
weapons.description: Una de las espadas legendarias que puede absorber el Haki de su portador.

name: Nami
description: Nami es la navegante de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja. Es conocida por su habilidad para predecir el clima y por su manejo del Clima-Tact.

weapons.name: Clima-Tact
weapons.description: Un bastón que permite a Nami manipular el clima para realizar ataques poderosos.

name: Vinsmoke Sanji
description: Sanji es el cocinero de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja. Es un maestro del combate con piernas y un experto culinario.

transformations.name: Diable Jambe
transformations.description: Sanji enciende sus piernas para realizar ataques poderosos de fuego.

transformations.name: Ifrit Jambe
transformations.description: Una versión mejorada del Diable Jambe con llamas azuladas más intensas.

name: Usopp
description: El francotirador de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja, conocido por su puntería y valentía.

weapons.name: Kabuto
weapons.description: Tirachinas gigante que utiliza para lanzar proyectiles especiales.

name: Chopper
description: El doctor de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja, es un reno que comió la Hito Hito no Mi, otorgándole habilidades humanas.

transformations.name: Heavy Point
transformations.description: Transformación que aumenta el tamaño y la fuerza de Chopper.

transformations.name: Monster Point
transformations.description: Transformación gigante que le otorga una fuerza increíble.

name: Nico Robin
description: La arqueóloga de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja, capaz de hacer florecer partes de su cuerpo en cualquier superficie.

name: Franky
description: El carpintero de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja, un cyborg con habilidades mecánicas increíbles.

weapons.name: Franky Shogun
weapons.description: Un mecha gigante creado por Franky.

name: Brook
description: El músico de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja, resucitado gracias a su Fruta del Diablo.

name: Jinbe
description: El timonel de los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja y un maestro del Fishman Karate.

name: Shanks
description: Commonly known as just 'Red Hair', is the chief of the Red Hair Pirates and one of the Four Emperors that rule over the New World. Having sailed with the legendary Roger Pirates since he was an infant, Shanks would begin his pirate career on their ship as an apprentice alongside Buggy, before forming his own crew following Roger's death.

weapons.name: Gryphon
weapons.description: Gryphon is a powerful and durable weapon, capable of clashing with Edward Newgate’s Murakumogiri and Dracule Mihawk’s Yoru, both of which are 12 Supreme Grade swords.

name: Benn Beckman
description: Benn Beckman is the first mate of the Red Hair Pirates and one of the most powerful characters in the series. He is known for his incredible intellect and combat skills, often seen smoking a cigarette.

weapons.name: Flintlock Pistol
weapons.description: Benn Beckman is known for his incredible marksmanship, using a flintlock pistol as his weapon of choice.

name: Lucky Roux
description: Lucky Roux is one of the senior officers of the Red Hair Pirates. He is known for his jovial personality and incredible speed, despite his large size.

name: Yasopp
description: Yasopp is the sniper of the Red Hair Pirates and one of the most skilled marksmen in the world. He is the father of Usopp and is known for his incredible accuracy.

weapons.name: Flintlock Rifle
weapons.description: Yasopp uses a flintlock rifle with unparalleled precision, capable of hitting targets from incredible distances.

name: Hongo
description: Hongo is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, known for his medical expertise and combat skills.

name: Bonk Punch
description: Bonk Punch is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, known for his immense strength and combat prowess.

name: Monster
description: Monster is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, a monkey who is often seen alongside Bonk Punch.

name: Limejuice
description: Limejuice is a member of the Red Hair Pirates. He is known for his agility and combat skills, often seen wielding a polearm.

weapons.name: Polearm
weapons.description: A long weapon used by Limejuice for both offensive and defensive maneuvers.

name: Building Snake
description: Building Snake is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, known for his agility and combat skills.

name: Gab
description: Gab is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, known for his combat skills and loyalty to Shanks.

name: Rockstar
description: Rockstar is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, known for his ambition and combat skills.

name: Marshal D. Teach
description: Commonly known as 'Blackbeard', is the captain of the Blackbeard Pirates and one of the Four Emperors. He is the only known person to wield the power of two Devil Fruits.

name: Jesus Burgess
description: Jesus Burgess is the captain of the first ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his immense strength and combat skills.

name: Shiryu
description: Shiryu is the captain of the second ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his swordsmanship and ability to turn invisible.

weapons.name: Sword
weapons.description: A powerful sword used by Shiryu.

name: Van Augur
description: Van Augur is the sniper of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his incredible marksmanship and teleportation abilities.

weapons.name: Rifle
weapons.description: A long-range rifle used by Van Augur.

name: Avalo Pizarro
description: Avalo Pizarro is the captain of the fourth ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his ability to merge with and control islands.

name: Laffitte
description: Laffitte is the navigator of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his stealth and ability to transform into a phantom bird.

name: Catarina Devon
description: Catarina Devon is the captain of the sixth ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. She is known for her ability to transform into a nine-tailed fox.

name: Sanjuan Wolf
description: Sanjuan Wolf is the captain of the seventh ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his immense size and ability to grow even larger.

name: Vasco Shot
description: Vasco Shot is the captain of the eighth ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his ability to consume and manipulate alcohol.

name: Doc Q
description: Doc Q is the doctor of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is known for his ability to inflict diseases on others.

name: Kuzan
description: Kuzan, also known as Aokiji, is a former Marine admiral who joined the Blackbeard Pirates. He possesses the Hie Hie no Mi, a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to create, control, and transform into ice.

name: Charlotte Linlin
description: Commonly known as 'Big Mom', she is the captain of the Big Mom Pirates and one of the Four Emperors. She possesses the Soru Soru no Mi, which allows her to manipulate souls.

name: Charlotte Katakuri
description: Charlotte Katakuri is the second son of the Charlotte Family and one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. He possesses the Mochi Mochi no Mi, a Special Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to create, control, and transform into mochi.

name: Charlotte Smoothie
description: Charlotte Smoothie is the 14th daughter of the Charlotte Family and one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. She possesses the Shibo Shibo no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows her to wring out liquid from both living and non-living things.

name: Charlotte Cracker
description: Charlotte Cracker is the 10th son of the Charlotte Family and one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. He possesses the Bisu Bisu no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to generate and manipulate biscuits.

name: Charlotte Perospero
description: Charlotte Perospero is the first son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He possesses the Pero Pero no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to create and manipulate candy.

name: Charlotte Daifuku
description: Charlotte Daifuku is the third son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He possesses the Hoya Hoya no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to summon a genie from his body.

name: Charlotte Oven
description: Charlotte Oven is the fourth son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He possesses the Netsu Netsu no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to generate and control heat.

name: Charlotte Mondée
description: Charlotte Mondée is the 5th daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She is known for her combat skills and loyalty to Big Mom.

name: Charlotte Hachée
description: Charlotte Hachée is the 7th daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She is known for her combat skills and loyalty to Big Mom.

name: Charlotte Effilée
description: Charlotte Effilée is the 8th daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She is known for her combat skills and loyalty to Big Mom.

name: Charlotte Brûlée
description: Charlotte Brûlée is the eighth daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She possesses the Mira Mira no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows her to create and manipulate mirrors.

name: Charlotte Counter
description: Charlotte Counter is the 10th son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He is known for his combat skills and loyalty to Big Mom.

name: Charlotte Cadenza
description: Charlotte Cadenza is the 11th son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He is known for his combat skills and loyalty to Big Mom.

name: Charlotte Cabaletta
description: Charlotte Cabaletta is the 12th son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He is known for his combat skills and loyalty to Big Mom.

name: Charlotte Compote
description: Charlotte Compote is the eldest daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She is known for her strength and combat skills.

name: Charlotte Mont-d'Or
description: Charlotte Mont-d'Or is the 19th son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He possesses the Buku Buku no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to manipulate books.

name: Charlotte Galette
description: Charlotte Galette is the 18th daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She possesses the Bata Bata no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows her to create and control butter.

name: Charlotte Opera
description: Charlotte Opera is the 5th son of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He possesses the Kuri Kuri no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows him to create and control cream.

name: Charlotte Amande
description: Charlotte Amande is the 3rd daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She is known for her swordsmanship and combat skills.

name: Charlotte Custard
description: Charlotte Custard is the 16th daughter of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She is known for her combat skills and loyalty to Big Mom.

name: Charlotte Angel
description: Charlotte Angel is the 17th daughter of the Charlotte Family, known for her serene personality and her ability to inspire her siblings.

name: Charlotte Zuccotto
description: Charlotte Zuccotto is a calm and collected officer of the Big Mom Pirates, specializing in logistics and strategy.

name: Charlotte Broyé
description: Charlotte Broyé is the 19th daughter of the Charlotte Family, known for her culinary skills and her role in managing the Big Mom Pirates’ supplies.

name: Charlotte Nusstorte
description: Charlotte Nusstorte is one of the older sons of the Charlotte Family, wielding the power of the Nuts Nuts Fruit to harden his body like a shell.

name: Charlotte Basskarte
description: Charlotte Basskarte is known for his jovial personality and exceptional skill in music, playing the bass for Big Mom’s celebrations.

name: Charlotte Dosmarche
description: Charlotte Dosmarche is one of the middle daughters of the Charlotte Family, known for her speed and agility in combat.

name: Charlotte Noisette
description: Charlotte Noisette, a younger sibling, uses the Nutmeg Nutmeg Fruit to release spicy clouds that disorient opponents.

name: Charlotte Moscato
description: Charlotte Moscato is one of the older sons of the Charlotte Family, remembered for his diplomatic nature and efforts to maintain peace within the crew.

name: Charlotte Mash
description: Charlotte Mash uses the Mash Mash Fruit to transform surfaces into a sticky, dough-like substance, trapping his opponents.

name: Charlotte Cornstarch
description: Charlotte Cornstarch, a brilliant tactician, is known for her precision in planning ambushes for the Big Mom Pirates.

name: Charlotte Compo
description: Charlotte Compo, with the Compo Compo Fruit, has the ability to combine objects into powerful composite weapons.

name: Charlotte Laurin
description: Charlotte Laurin is a skilled swordswoman and one of the family members specializing in defense tactics.

name: Charlotte Mozart
description: Charlotte Mozart uses the Sound Sound Fruit to create harmonious or dissonant vibrations that incapacitate enemies.

name: Charlotte Marnier
description: Charlotte Marnier, a cheerful and creative family member, uses the Citrus Citrus Fruit to release acidic sprays in battle.

name: Charlotte High-Fat
description: Charlotte High-Fat is a towering figure with immense strength, known for his role in defending the Big Mom Pirates' territories.

name: Charlotte Tablet
description: Charlotte Tablet uses the Info Info Fruit to store and process immense amounts of data, acting as the intelligence officer for the crew.

name: Charlotte Citron
description: Charlotte Citron, a bright and sharp thinker, is a strategist and diplomat for the Big Mom Pirates.

name: Charlotte Cinnamon
description: Charlotte Cinnamon is a graceful fighter who uses her agility and precision to outmaneuver her enemies.

name: Charlotte Saint-Marc
description: Charlotte Saint-Marc uses the Saint Saint Fruit to create protective barriers and heal minor injuries.

name: Charlotte Basans
description: Charlotte Basans is a skilled cook who specializes in preparing unique meals for the Big Mom Pirates.

name: Charlotte Melise
description: Charlotte Melise uses the Sweet Sweet Fruit to generate sticky traps that immobilize her enemies.

name: Charlotte Dacquoise
description: Charlotte Dacquoise is known for her calm demeanor and her sharp skills in negotiation and diplomacy.

name: Charlotte Poire
description: Charlotte Poire wields the Pear Pear Fruit, allowing her to create explosive pear-shaped bombs.

name: Charlotte Snack
description: Charlotte Snack is a former Sweet Commander, known for his immense strength and endurance in battle.

name: Charlotte Bavarois
description: Charlotte Bavarois uses the Cream Cream Fruit to generate slippery cream that hinders his opponents' movements.

name: Charlotte Prim
description: Charlotte Prim is a disciplined fighter who trains the younger members of the Big Mom Pirates in combat techniques.

name: Charlotte Kanten
description: Charlotte Kanten uses the Gel Gel Fruit to create transparent barriers and traps for her enemies.

name: Charlotte Kato
description: Charlotte Kato is a fierce warrior who specializes in close-combat techniques and wields a pair of bladed gauntlets.

name: Charlotte Montb
description: Charlotte Montb uses the Mont Mont Fruit to generate and control mountainous terrain, creating obstacles for enemies.

name: Charlotte Chiboust
description: Charlotte Chiboust is a pyrokinetic warrior, using the Flame Flame Fruit to overwhelm her enemies with fire-based attacks.

name: Charlotte Mobile
description: Charlotte Mobile uses the Gear Gear Fruit to manipulate machinery and enhance the efficiency of the crew's ships.

name: Charlotte Marble
description: Charlotte Marble is a defensive specialist who uses her marble-like shield to block even the most powerful attacks.

name: Charlotte Myukuru
description: Charlotte Myukuru uses the Feather Feather Fruit to create razor-sharp feathers that she controls with precision.

name: Charlotte Maple
description: Charlotte Maple is known for her sticky combat style, using syrup-like tactics to immobilize foes.

name: Charlotte Brownie
description: Charlotte Brownie uses the Choco Choco Fruit to create chocolate-based constructs that harden like steel.

name: Charlotte Joconde
description: Charlotte Joconde is an elegant combatant who uses swift and precise swordplay to dominate her opponents.

name: Charlotte Raisin
description: Charlotte Raisin uses the Raisin Raisin Fruit to dehydrate objects and opponents, making them brittle and easy to shatter.

name: Charlotte Panna
description: Charlotte Panna is known for her swift movements and ability to disorient opponents with her unpredictable fighting style.

name: Charlotte Mascarpone
description: Charlotte Mascarpone uses the Cheese Cheese Fruit to create sticky and malleable cheese barriers that trap his enemies.

name: Charlotte Joscarpone
description: Charlotte Joscarpone works closely with his brother Mascarpone, using creamy constructs to confuse and hinder opponents.

name: Charlotte Yuen
description: Charlotte Yuen is a loyal enforcer of the Big Mom Pirates, relying on brute strength and tenacity in battle.

name: Charlotte Newichi
description: Charlotte Newichi is one of the younger sons of the Charlotte Family, known for his mischievous nature and quick reflexes.

name: Charlotte Newji
description: Charlotte Newji is a reserved member of the family, often seen strategizing with his older siblings during battles.

name: Charlotte Newsan
description: Charlotte Newsan uses the Paper Paper Fruit to create and manipulate sharp paper constructs for offense and defense.

name: Charlotte Newshi
description: Charlotte Newshi is a skilled combatant who trains in secret to perfect his Haki-based techniques.

name: Charlotte Newgo
description: Charlotte Newgo uses the Go Go Fruit to enhance his speed, making him one of the fastest members of the crew.

name: Charlotte Nutmeg
description: Charlotte Nutmeg is a fiery warrior with a strong sense of justice and fierce loyalty to her family.

name: Charlotte Akimeg
description: Charlotte Akimeg is known for her tactical acumen and her ability to read her enemies' movements in battle.

name: Charlotte Allmeg
description: Charlotte Allmeg is a cheerful and kind-hearted member of the family, often helping maintain morale among the crew.

name: Charlotte Harumeg
description: Charlotte Harumeg uses the Spring Spring Fruit to enhance her jumps and strikes with spring-like energy.

name: Charlotte Fuyumeg
description: Charlotte Fuyumeg wields the Ice Ice Fruit, giving her the ability to freeze anything she touches, making her a formidable combatant.

name: Charlotte Nougat
description: Charlotte Nougat uses the Nougat Nougat Fruit to create sticky and malleable barriers, slowing down his opponents.

name: Charlotte Pudding
description: Charlotte Pudding is the 35th daughter of the Charlotte Family, possessing a photographic memory and exceptional intelligence.

name: Charlotte Flampe
description: Charlotte Flampe is the 36th daughter of the Charlotte Family, known for her mischievous and cunning nature.

name: Charlotte Anglais
description: Charlotte Anglais uses the Whisk Whisk Fruit to create whirlwind-like attacks that disorient her enemies.

name: Charlotte Wafers
description: Charlotte Wafers is a resourceful fighter who specializes in defensive techniques and strategic thinking.

name: Charlotte Wiro
description: Charlotte Wiro uses the Wire Wire Fruit to manipulate metallic wires, binding and slicing his opponents with ease.

name: Charlotte De-Chat
description: Charlotte De-Chat is a graceful and agile fighter, often compared to a cat due to her nimbleness and reflexes.

name: Charlotte Normande
description: Charlotte Normande uses the Milk Milk Fruit to produce high-pressure streams of milk for both offense and defense.

name: Charlotte Dolce
description: Charlotte Dolce is one of the playful younger siblings in the family, often assisting in smaller missions with his twin brother Dragee.

name: Charlotte Dragée
description: Charlotte Dragée is Dolce's twin brother, known for his carefree attitude and his expertise in setting traps.

name: Charlotte Anana
description: Charlotte Anana uses the Pine Pine Fruit to summon thorny vines that ensnare and immobilize her enemies.
